name: Bullet Limbo
description:
This project was made in 4 days for the Bullet Hell Jam 2022.

Barely finished it for the submission time. Graphics, options and bugs will be fixed at a later time. Hope you enjoy playing this little project.

Credits for assets used:

Skull Enemy - (unTied Games) https://untiedgames.itch.io/floating-skull-enemy

Slime Enemy - (Stealthix) https://stealthix.itch.io/animated-slimes

Dungeon Tileset - (FirstBlood) https://aekae13.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-walls-reconfig

Key Sprite - (Atole6) https://atole6.itch.io/2d-titleset-doungeon

Heart Sprite - (SwooshWhoosh) https://swooshwhoosh.itch.io/heartsui

Boss Enemy - Redshrike
